item.title: Why Not Use Heroku for Your Ghost Blog
item.description: I tried to set up a personal blog for free using Heroku and Ghost. After some time trying to setup this, I’ve come to the conclusion that this really does not works as planned. The main problem is how Heroku works for our basic use case of a blog. How Heroku works For our needs to host a blog, Heroku is just a service where you can host your website files.
